description: This Java class configures an AuditorAware component for Spring Data JPA auditing by providing the current auditor's identifier, typically for automatic population of audit fields like createdBy or lastModifiedBy.

classes.name: AuditorAwareConfig
classes.description: A configuration class implementing AuditorAware to supply current auditor information based on request context.

methods.name: getCurrentAuditor
methods.description: Returns an Optional containing the current user's auth ID from the request context or 'SYSTEM_USER' if no auth ID is available.
